directions: Heat a skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir ground beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, about 5-7 minutes. Drain and discard grease.
Stir in taco seasoning and water according to package instructions. Simmer until the mixture has thickened.
Warm tortillas in a hot skillet until soft, about 30 seconds per side.
Assemble tacos by placing beef mixture in the center of each tortilla. Top with lettuce, cheese, tomatoes, and sour cream as desired.
